Description.Text:
Elysees Niel Hotel is located in central Paris, just a 3-minute walk from the famous Champs-Elyses and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

The guest rooms at the Elysees Niel have a classical dcor and are all soundproofed. Each is equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a modern bathroom with both shower and bath.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotels dining room, or in guests rooms upon request. There is also a lounge where guests can relax beside the fireplace.

The hotel reception desk is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are offered daily in the hotel lobby.

Elysees Niel Hotel is situated 900 metres from the Palais des Congrs. It is just 300 metres from the Ternes Metro Station and the Charles de Gaulle Etoile RER Station is a 5-minute walk away.

SINGLE - ROOM - The hotel Niel Paris welcomes you in a very cosy atmosphere and offers you an elegant and comfortable space. Each room offers you a distinctive atmosphere with warm colors and refined fabrics, in harmony with the fine wood furniture.
1 single bed
Air-conditioned hot/cold
Double glazing
Drapes
Free safe at your disposal
Free Wi-Fi
Flat screen and LCD TV with satellite and Canal +
Direct phone (internal calls and outside calls)
Wakeup call by reception desk, on request
Bathroom with shower or bath, hair dryer and toilet DOUBLE - ROOM - The hotel Niel Paris welcomes you in a very cosy atmosphere and offers you an elegant and comfortable space. Each room offers you a distinctive atmosphere with warm colors and refined fabrics, in harmony with the fine wood furniture.
1 Double bed
Air-conditioned hot/cold
Double glazing
Drapes
Free safe at your disposal
Free Wi-Fi
Flat screen and LCD TV with satellite and Canal +
Direct phone (internal calls and outside calls)
Wakeup call by reception desk, on request
Bathroom with shower or bath, hair dryer and toilet TRIPPLE - ROOM - The hotel Niel Paris welcomes you in a very cosy atmosphere and offers you an elegant and comfortable space. Each room offers you a distinctive atmosphere with warm colors and refined fabrics, in harmony with the fine wood furniture.1 double bed + 1 single bed or 3 single beds

On the ground floor of the hotel Niel Paris, a room suitable for disabled persons (PMR) is available.
